Title: La Scala Sterling Silver Pendant with Mother of Pearl and Cubic Zirconia 16-17"
Description: La Scala Sterling Silver Apple Pendant with Mother of Pearl and Cubic Zirconia 16-17". It is stronger than silver, does not tarnish, and is resistant to scratches.To maintain your jewellery always avoid spraying perfumes or working with chemical products while wearing your jewellery.
